website_summaries.verdict: A simple dolly with a steel frame that helps secure and roll your bucket easily.
pros: Design gives this dolly a lot of function
cons: These casters do not have locks and will always free-roll

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to be sure it fit a variety of buckets and it does that nicely.
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted one of these for some time and was thinking of making one myself. I would recommend this dolly to anyone who does a lot of low work like receptacles as it is perfect. It also makes it nice to have a seat when there is no other place on a job site. I have buckets with parts trays the fit inside and having them right under me save a lot of trips to look for them. It is very well made and can be used as a rolling palet for many items.
customer_reviews.author: Donald L. Jones

customer_reviews.title: These fill our needs perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: We use these for our salt buckets. We make bath salts and store them in 5-gallon buckets. We have 8 different scents, and they all roll under a work station to be out of the way when we're not refilling from them. The rollers are perfect because they don't take up a lot of room outside the parameter of the bucket, they are very easily maneuvered, and they are super sturdy. The buckets weigh 50 lbs when we fill them, and the rollers handle them very well. Wish we would have bought them a few years ago. Riverdance Soapworks LLC
customer_reviews.author: D. Petersen

customer_reviews.title: durability
customer_reviews.text: These dollies are fantastic. We use them to move 60 lb 5 gallon buckets. They are sturdy, stable and easy to use. We are going to buy some more too. This is a good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my soap room to store my buckets of oils on and be able to move them around more easily, absolutely love them and will be getting more for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Fuchs

customer_reviews.title: ... it to haul dog food around so it works great for that but sometimes a wheel sticks a little
customer_reviews.text: I use it to haul dog food around so it works great for that but sometimes a wheel sticks a little, though not enough to change the performance of the item
customer_reviews.author: ChocoTaco19

customer_reviews.title: Both my back and I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I've been lugging 5 gallon buckets of lotions and oils for my business for YEARS! Super easy to assemble and even easier on my back to use. Thank you. It's my new favorite purchase for my business. Makena Shepard Moon Concoctions
customer_reviews.author: Makena Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Works for portable microphone stand
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to mount a vocal microphone stand on it and it works perfectly. Quality construction and heavy weight steel.
customer_reviews.author: Baggy britches

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy dollies for 5 gal buckets. Used for towel buckets in restaurant and these are easy to clean and very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kiel

customer_reviews.title: Dolly well made and wheels around very easily.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived ahead of scheduled delivery date. Dolly well made and wheels around very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great 5 Gallon Drum Dollies!
customer_reviews.text: I had no prolem with this item whatsoever. Nice size casters are on the dollies compared to the ones, I had purchased at Nother Tool around 11/2 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis  A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does the job better than the more expensive ones on the market. 30 + year tile Master!
customer_reviews.author: Denny hovey

customer_reviews.title: WHEELS FOREVER
customer_reviews.text: Many different uses from this sturdy and well-made item. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: John R

customer_reviews.title: does not fit standard plastic 5 gal bucket
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the reviews. These castors do not firmly hold the width of a 5 gal plastic bucket, the kind you get from a hardware store. There is a big gap between the edge and the bucket. Oh well. Nice looking and sturdy tho.
customer_reviews.author: deliveryodyssey

product_meta.title: Heavy Duty 5 Gallon Drum Bucket Dolly Dollies Steel Frame Easy Push Roll Swivel Casters
feature_bullets: Inner Width/Diameter: 12" (holds buckets up to 12" in diameter); Outer Width: 17-1/2" x 17-1/2"
Four premium wheel casters for a smooth, easy push
Heavy duty powder coated steel construction, strong polycarbonate wheel casters
